change_path.description: A path that was changed in a version from a version control system, either a Subversion or Git commit.
change_path.$comment: All fields are strings for cross-compatibility with older importers.

version_id.description: Identifier of the version, either a hexadecimal SHA hash or an incremental version number.

file.description: Path to the file as it is named after the change.

change_type.description: Type of change made to the file. This is `M` for Modified, `A` for Added, `D` for Deleted or `R` for Replaced.

insertions.description: Number of lines added to the file.

deletions.description: Number of files removed from the file.

size.description: Size in bytes of the file or the change.
